en.title: Leo Pledge
en.content:
### I pledge of my hands 
### Extended and open to help those in need 
### I pledge of my heart, reach for it 
### And it will be touched 
###  I pledge of my ears 
### To hear another’s outcry 
### My eyes to see the plight of others 
### My knowledge to bring a man 
### Closer to his dreams 
### I pledge of myself 
### For the betterment of my community 
### And my country
